trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: XAML Implicit Collection Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 隱含集合用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *oneOrMoreTimelineObjectElements*
trans-unit.target: *oneOrMoreTimelineObjectElements*

trans-unit.source: One or more <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> objects, declared using object element syntax.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>宣告使用物件項目語法的物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Collection of elements this instance is based on.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合所根據的項目集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> class that includes all of the same elements as an existing collection.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個類別含有與現有集合相同的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <paramref name="collection" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: 當 <paramref name="collection" /> 是空的時發生。

trans-unit.source: The initial capacity of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> 的初始容量。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> with the specified initial capacity.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的初始容量，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The object to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的物件。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> object into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 將新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> 物件插入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> 中移除所有項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> 是否包含指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is found; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到 <paramref name="value" /> 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The destination array.
trans-unit.target: 目的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index position where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 以零起始的索引位置，並從這裡開始複製。

trans-unit.source: Copies the items of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> to the passed Timeline array, starting at the specified index position.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的索引位置開始，將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> 的項目複製至傳遞的 Timeline 陣列。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items contained in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> 中包含的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The number of items contained in this instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體中包含的項目數。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that can iterate the members of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得列舉程式，這個列舉程式可逐一查看集合的成員。

trans-unit.source: An object that can iterate the members of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 可以逐一查看集合成員的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based index position of a Timeline object in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> 中 Timeline 物件以零起始的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The index position of <paramref name="value" /> within this list.
trans-unit.target: 這個清單內 <paramref name="value" /> 的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: If not found, -1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到，則傳回 -1。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index position into which <c>value</c> is inserted.
trans-unit.target: 要插入 <c>value</c> 之以零起始的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The object to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的物件。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified Timeline object into this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> at the specified index position.
trans-unit.target: 在指定索引位置處，將指定的 Timeline 物件插入這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The index position to access.
trans-unit.target: 要存取的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an item at the specified index position within this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定項目，這個項目位於這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> 內的指定索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The Timeline object at the <paramref name="index" /> position.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="index" /> 位置的 Timeline 物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero or greater than or equal to the size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於零，或大於或等於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> 的大小。

trans-unit.source: The object to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的物件。

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> from this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 從這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> 移除指定之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> 的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the operation was successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業成功，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index position of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除項目之以零起始的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> at the specified index position from this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 從這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> 的指定索引位置上移除 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1.IsReadOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1.IsReadOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是唯讀，則為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 物件，可用於逐一查看集合。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that receives the copied items from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> 接收複製項目的以零為起始的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The first position in the specified <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的第一個位置，將接收複製來的內容。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 的存取為同步 (安全執行緒)，則為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />。

trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Add(System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: The position into which the new element was inserted.
trans-unit.target: 插入新項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> has a fixed size; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 有固定大小，則為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" /> is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是唯讀，則為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 要取得或設定之以零為起始的項目索引。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.Item(System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.Item(System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 在指定索引上的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要從 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 移除的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineCollection" />。
